content: https://decrypt.co/202776/almost-all-mining-stocks-have-outpaced-bitcoin-this-yearAlmost all the mining stocks, except two, have outperformed Bitcoin by more than double this year despite the ongoing bear market.The year-to-date returns of all mining stocks, except for two, have far outpaced Bitcoin's rise of 84.61%.What do you think of this?
